title: BRIEF-India's Tata Steel Exec Says Usha Martin Turnaround Impacted By Auto Industry
text:
BRIEF-India's Tata Steel Exec Says Usha Martin Turnaround Impacted By Auto Industry

Stock Markets 12 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 14:01)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Tata Steel Exec Says Usha Martin Turnaround Impacted By Auto Industry Sept 23 (Reuters) - Tata Steel Ltd, Chief exec, T V Narendran Says: * HOPE SECOND HALF OF YEAR TO BE BETTER DUE TO FESTIVE DEMAND, CORP TAX CUT AND INFRA SPEND BY GOVERNMENT * USHA MARTIN TURNAROUND IMPACTED BY AUTO INDUSTRY BUT HOPE SECOND HALF WILL BE BETTER Further company coverage: TISC.NS

BRIEF-India's Tata Steel Exec Says Usha Martin Turnaround Impacted By Auto Industry
description: BRIEF-India's Tata Steel Exec Says Usha Martin Turnaround Impacted By Auto Industry
